Today I introduced a package of three bills that will help us end the deadly scourge of impaired and distracted driving.

This is an issue that has always been near and dear to my heart, and it's past time we took action at the federal level.

We need to ensure the @MTA is taking appropriate steps to secure our transit system from these threats. https://www.nydailynews.com/news/politics/ny-kathleen-rice-subway-nyc-mta-cyber-crime-chinese-hackers-byford-20190529-miu27rlikbhh3le77bcdmq52ba-story.html …
I said it last week and I'll say it again now. Congress must begin an impeachment inquiry. We have a constitutional obligation to do so -- because no one is above the law.

Robert Mueller made it clear that it was DOJ policy, not a lack of evidence, that prevented him from charging the President with a crime.

His hands were tied. But ours are not. Congress has full authority to hold the President accountable, and it's past time that we exercise it.

Today we pause to remember the fallen heroes from #NY04 and across the country who made the ultimate sacrifice for our nation. And I'm praying for all the families who are honoring the memory of a loved one.

Today and every day we are eternally grateful. #MemorialDay

The Trump Administration is putting the lives of trans Americans at risk and turning back the clock on progress. They want to allow hospitals & insurance companies to discriminate against trans patients.

No one knows the urgency of climate change like #NY04, an area still recovering from Superstorm Sandy. And because this Administration refuses to act, New York must. Thank you @toddkaminsky & @SteveEngles for your leadership on this issue. Looking forward to seeing the CCPA pass!

Today Long Island legislators came together to call for the passage of the CCPA, one of the most aggressive climate change plans ever introduced by a state. The #SECUREAct: 

1. Makes it easier for small businesses to offer retirement plans
2. Ensures home health care workers can receive retirement benefits
3. Eliminates unfair tax hikes on Gold Star families caused by the GOP's tax law

I'm proud to support this bipartisan bill.

For over two years the President has systematically dismantled our democracy and defied the rule of law. This cannot stand.

Congress has a moral obligation to put our politics aside and take action. We need to start impeachment proceedings. 

The President is not above the law.

Thank you to all the #NY04 constituents who joined women from across the country today in standing up for women's health care and the right to choose!

That's why I'm proud to cosponsor the bipartisan Honest Ads Act, which will ensure the American people know who is paying for the ads they see on TV and online and will and prevent foreign actors from manipulating the public during our election process. This is long overdue.

We know that our elections are vulnerable to foreign interference and disinformation campaigns. We saw Russia exploit those loopholes in 2016 and we know they are trying again ahead of 2020. So it's critical that we recognize these threats and take action to counter them.
Not going to happen. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1126121031251431428 …
